DOC.brief_summary: Community colleges 45 % nation 's undergraduate higher smoke prevalence rate 4-year college . California 's community college comprise nation 's large high education system , Sacramento second large community college district . As college encourage become smoke tobacco-free campus , smoker enrol community college campus need great support . However , community college may lack student health clinic resource 4-year college student live campus . Little evidence date demonstrates effective intervention smoker community college campus . This pilot study seek demonstrate feasibility promise outcome two cessation intervention , compare usual care community college campus . The first intervention base promising model brief motivational interviewing deliver peer educator , develop community lead Breathe California Sacramento-Emigrant Trails ( BCSET ) Sacramento Taking Action Against Tobacco Dependence ( STAND ) project . The second intervention base direct enrollment California Smokers ' Helpline , demonstrate utility promote smoke cessation among young adult low socioeconomic status . Usual care consist student go student health center smoke cessation assistance .
